casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the Care and Treatment of: W.H., a/k/a W.G.H., Appellant. No. ED 104254-01 Missouri Court of Appeals, Eastern District, DIVISION FOUR. FILED: December 19, 2017
Motion for Rehearing and/or Transfer to Supreme Court Denied February 26, 2018
Application for Transfer Denied May 1, 2018 FOR APPELLANT: Chelsea R. Mitchell, 1000 W Nifong, Building 7, Suite 100, Colombia, Missouri 65203. FOR RESPONDENT: Shaun J. Mackelprang, Gregory M. Goodwin-( co-counsel), P.O. Box 899, Jefferson City, Missouri 65102. Before Colleen Dolan, P.J., Mary K. Hoff, J., and Lisa Van Amburg, J.

ORDER

PER CURIAM

W.H. appeals the trial court's judgment, after a jury trial, committing him to the custody of the Department of Mental Health (DMH) under the Sexually Violent Predator Act (SVPA). We affirm.

We have reviewed the briefs of the parties and the record on appeal and find no error of law. No jurisprudential purpose would be served by a written opinion. However, the parties have been furnished with a memorandum opinion for their information only, setting forth the facts and reasons for this order.

The judgment of the trial court is affirmed in accordance with Rule 84.16(b).
